trans-unit.source: Represents a control that displays data in a customizable grid.
trans-unit.target: 表示可自訂的方格中顯示資料的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The DataGrid control provides a flexible way to display a collection of data in rows and columns.
trans-unit.target: DataGrid 控制項提供彈性的方式，以顯示資料列和資料行中的資料集合。

trans-unit.source: The DataGrid includes built-in column types and a template column for hosting custom content.
trans-unit.target: DataGrid 包含內建的資料行類型與樣板資料行來裝載自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: The built-in row type includes a drop-down details section that you can use to display additional content below the cell values.
trans-unit.target: 內建的資料列型別包含下拉式清單詳細資料 區段可讓您顯示的資料格值下方的其他內容。

trans-unit.source: Binding to Data To bind the DataGrid to data, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 繫結資料至繫結至 DataGrid 的資料，設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>屬性<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>實作。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each row in the data grid is bound to an object in the data source, and each column in the data grid is bound to a property of the data object.
trans-unit.target: 在資料格中的每個資料列繫結至資料來源中的物件，並在資料格中的每個資料行繫結至資料物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: In order for the DataGrid user interface to update automatically when items are added to or removed from the source data, the DataGrid must be bound to a collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> interface, such as an <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 為了讓 DataGrid 使用者介面加入或移除資料來源項目時自動更新，必須是繫結至 DataGrid 實作<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged>介面，例如<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601></xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged>集合

trans-unit.source: To automatically reflect property changes, the objects in the source collection must implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> interface.
trans-unit.target: 若要自動反映屬性的變更，來源集合中的物件必須實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Binding (WPF)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結 (WPF)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Columns By default, the DataGrid control generates columns automatically when you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 資料行在預設情況下，DataGrid 控制項產生的資料行自動當您設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The type of column that is generated depends on the type of data in the column.
trans-unit.target: 產生的資料行的類型取決於資料行中的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the generated columns types.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出產生資料行類型。

trans-unit.source: |Generated Column Type|Data Type| |---------------------------|---------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn>|<xref:System.String>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn>|<xref:System.Boolean>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn>|<xref:System.Enum>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn>|<xref:System.Uri>| The following illustration shows each of the column types.
trans-unit.target: |產生資料行類型 |資料型別 | |---------------------------|---------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn>|<xref:System.String>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn>|<xref:System.Boolean>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn>|<xref:System.Enum>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn>|<xref:System.Uri>| 下圖顯示每個資料行類型。</xref:System.Uri> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn> </xref:System.Enum> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn> </xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn>

trans-unit.source: ![DataGrid with all four default column types](~/add/media/ndp-datagriddefault.png "DataGrid with all four default column types") When columns are auto-generated, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn> event to customize or cancel columns before they are added to the DataGrid.
trans-unit.target: ![所有四個預設資料行類型與 DataGrid](~/add/media/ndp-datagriddefault.png "DataGrid 的所有四個預設資料行類型")資料行時，自動產生，您可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn>事件，若要自訂或取消之前被新增至 DataGrid 的資料行。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn>

trans-unit.source: If you add both user-defined columns and auto-generated columns to the DataGrid, the user-defined columns are added first.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將使用者定義資料行和自動產生的資料行加入 DataGrid 時，就是第一個先新增的使用者定義資料行。

trans-unit.source: To rearrange the display order of the columns, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> property for individual columns.
trans-unit.target: 若要重新排列資料行的顯示順序，您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A>個別資料行的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can prevent automatic column generation by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定防止自動的資料行產生<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>屬性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you want to create and configure all columns explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 這非常有用，如果您想要建立並明確地設定所有資料行。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn> type to define a custom column if the built-in column types do not meet your needs.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn>來定義自訂的資料行，如果內建的資料行類型不符合您需求的型別。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn> type provides <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellEditingTemplate%2A> properties that enable you to specify content templates for both display and editing modes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn>類型提供<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellTemplate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellEditingTemplate%2A>屬性，可讓您指定的顯示和編輯模式範本內容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellEditingTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn>

trans-unit.source: For example, you could define a custom column for dates.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以定義自訂的資料行的日期。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellTemplate%2A> could define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> to display a date, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellEditingTemplate%2A> could define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker> control to edit the date.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellTemplate%2A>可以定義<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>要顯示的日期，而<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellEditingTemplate%2A>可以定義<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>控制項編輯的日期。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellEditingTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection to programmatically add, insert, remove, and change any columns in the control at run time.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>以程式設計方式加入、 插入、 移除，並在執行階段變更控制項中的任何資料行的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsAutoGenerated%2A> property to determine whether a column is auto generated or user defined.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsAutoGenerated%2A>屬性來判斷資料行是否自動產生或使用者定義。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsAutoGenerated%2A>

trans-unit.source: Auto-generated columns will be automatically added, removed, or regenerated when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> changes.
trans-unit.target: 自動產生的資料行，會自動新增、 移除或重新產生時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>變更。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Selection By default, the entire row is selected when a user clicks a cell in a DataGrid, and a user can select multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下資料格 」 中的資料格，而且使用者可以選取多個資料列時，會選取選取項目根據預設，整個資料列。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A> property to specify whether a user can select cells, full rows, or both.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>屬性來指定使用者是否可以選取資料格、 完整的資料列，或兩者。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> property to specify whether multiple rows or cells can be selected, or only single rows or cells.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>若要指定多個資料列或資料格可供選取，還是僅單一資料列或資料格屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can get information about the cells that are selected from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從中取得資訊會從選取的資料格<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can get information about cells for which selection has changed in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedCellsChangedEventArgs> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCellsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從中取得資訊中選取範圍已變更的資料格<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedCellsChangedEventArgs>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCellsChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCellsChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedCellsChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectAllCells%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.UnselectAllCells%2A> methods to programmatically select or unselect all cells.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectAllCells%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.UnselectAllCells%2A>方法來以程式設計方式選取或取消選取所有資料格。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.UnselectAllCells%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectAllCells%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default Keyboard and Mouse Behavior in the DataGrid Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設鍵盤和滑鼠 DataGrid 控制項中的行為](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Grouping, Sorting, and Filtering By default, you can sort items in a DataGrid by clicking the column header.
trans-unit.target: 群組、 排序，以及篩選的預設值，可以按一下資料行標頭來排序 DataGrid 中的項目。

trans-unit.source: You can customize sorting by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Sorting> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以自訂排序處理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Sorting>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Sorting>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the default sort, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSortingEventArgs.Handled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消的預設排序，請設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSortingEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSortingEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also sort the source data before it is displayed in the DataGrid.
trans-unit.target: DataGrid 中顯示之前，您也可以排序的來源資料。

trans-unit.source: To group, sort, and filter data in the DataGrid, you bind the DataGrid to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView> implementation that supports these operations.
trans-unit.target: 要分組、 排序和篩選資料，在資料格中，您將繫結至 DataGrid<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView>支援這些作業的實作。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView>

trans-unit.source: You then perform the operations on the collection view.
trans-unit.target: 接著，您會執行的作業集合檢視。

trans-unit.source: When items are grouped in the DataGrid, you can define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle> that specifies the appearance of each group.
trans-unit.target: 當 DataGrid 中分組項目時，您可以定義<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle>，指定每個群組的外觀。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle>

trans-unit.source: You apply the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle> by adding it to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A> collection of the DataGrid.
trans-unit.target: 您套用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle>將它加入至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A>DataGrid 的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle>

trans-unit.source: If you have multiple levels of grouping, you can apply different styles to each group level.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有多個層級的群組，您可以將不同的樣式套用到每個群組層級。

trans-unit.source: Styles are applied in the order in which they are defined.
trans-unit.target: 樣式中所定義的順序套用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Group, Sort, and Filter Data in the DataGrid Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何︰ 分組、 排序和 DataGrid 控制項中的篩選資料](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Editing By default, you can edit items directly in the DataGrid.
trans-unit.target: 編輯預設情況下，您可以編輯直接在資料格中的項目。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee that edits can be committed and canceled correctly, the objects in the DataGrid must implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: 若要保證可以認可並正確地取消編輯，DataGrid 中的物件必須實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.IsReadOnly%2A> property to `true` to disable editing in the DataGrid.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.IsReadOnly%2A>屬性`true`編輯 DataGrid 中停用。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DataGrid has built-in support for the following editing commands: |Command|Default Input Binding| |-------------|---------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginEditCommand>|F2| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CancelEditCommand>|ESC| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEditCommand>|ENTER| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand%2A>|DELETE| You put the current cell into edit mode by clicking it or pressing F2.
trans-unit.target: 資料格具有內建支援下列的編輯命令: |命令 |預設輸入繫結 | |-------------|---------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginEditCommand>|F2 | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CancelEditCommand>|ESC | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEditCommand>|輸入 | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand%2A>|刪除 | 您將目前的儲存格置於編輯模式按一下或按 F2。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.DeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEditCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CancelEditCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginEditCommand>

trans-unit.source: A cell-level edit is committed when you move to another cell in the same row or press ENTER while the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 當您移至相同的資料列中的另一個資料格，或按下 ENTER 儲存格處於編輯模式時，就會認可資料格層級編輯。

trans-unit.source: All edits in a row are committed when you move to another row or press ENTER while the row is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 移至另一個資料列或資料列處於編輯模式時，請按下 ENTER 時，會認可所有資料列中的編輯作業。

trans-unit.source: You cancel a cell edit by pressing ESC one time, and cancel all edits in a row by pressing ESC two times.
trans-unit.target: 您一次，按下 esc 鍵取消的儲存格的編輯，並按下 esc 鍵兩次來取消資料列中所有的編輯作業。

trans-unit.source: For more information about programmatically committing and canceling edits, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEdit%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CancelEdit%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計方式認可，以及取消編輯的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEdit%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CancelEdit%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CancelEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about edit-related events, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginningEdit>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.PreparingCellForEdit>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CellEditEnding>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowEditEnding>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關編輯相關事件的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginningEdit>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.PreparingCellForEdit>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CellEditEnding>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowEditEnding>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowEditEnding> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CellEditEnding> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.PreparingCellForEdit> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginningEdit>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserAddRows%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserDeleteRows%2A> properties to specify whether a user can add or delete rows.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserAddRows%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserDeleteRows%2A>屬性，以指定使用者是否可以加入或刪除資料列。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserDeleteRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserAddRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: A user can delete selected rows by pressing the DELETE key.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以按 DELETE 鍵，以刪除選取的資料列。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserAddRows%2A> property is set to `true`, a new item row is added as the last row in the DataGrid.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserAddRows%2A>屬性設定為`true`，新的項目資料列會成為 DataGrid 中的最後一個資料列。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserAddRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set default values for new items by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.InitializingNewItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定預設值，新的項目處理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.InitializingNewItem>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.InitializingNewItem>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Whether editing actions are allowed is influenced by a variety of additional factors, including the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.IsReadOnly%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled%2A> state of the DataGrid, and whether the underlying data collection allows the action.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 是否允許編輯動作會受其他因素，包括各種<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.IsReadOnly%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled%2A>DataGrid 的狀態和基礎資料集合是否允許動作。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Validation The DataGrid enables you to perform validation at both the cell and row level.
trans-unit.target: DataGrid 驗證可讓您執行資料格和資料列層級的驗證。

trans-unit.source: With cell-level validation, you validate individual properties of a bound data object when a user updates a value.
trans-unit.target: 資料格層級驗證時，您會驗證個別屬性繫結的資料物件的使用者更新值時。

trans-unit.source: With row-level validation, you validate entire data objects when a user commits changes to a row.
trans-unit.target: 資料列層級驗證時，您會驗證整個資料的物件，當使用者將變更認可至資料列。

trans-unit.source: You can provide customized visual feedback for row-level validation errors by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowValidationErrorTemplate%2A> property, or you can use the default error indicator.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定資料列層級驗證錯誤提供自訂的視覺化回饋<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowValidationErrorTemplate%2A>屬性，或者您可以使用預設錯誤指標。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowValidationErrorTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a custom validation rule, create a class that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> class and implement the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立自訂驗證規則，請建立衍生自類別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>類別，並實作<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: Add the custom validation rule to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowValidationRules%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 新增自訂驗證規則，以便<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowValidationRules%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowValidationRules%2A>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the DataGrid Control The DataGrid control supports common table formatting options, such as alternating row backgrounds and the ability to show or hide headers, gridlines, and scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: 自訂 DataGrid 控制項中的 DataGrid 控制項支援通用資料表格式選項，例如交替列背景、 顯示或隱藏標頭、 格線和捲軸的能力。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the control provides several style and template properties that you can use to completely change the appearance of the control and its rows, columns, headers, and cells.
trans-unit.target: 此外，控制項提供數個可用來控制其資料列、 資料行、 標頭和資料格的外觀會完全變更樣式和樣板屬性。

trans-unit.source: To customize DataGrid behavior, you can handle events for selection change, cell editing, and column re-ordering.
trans-unit.target: 若要自訂 DataGrid 行為，您可以處理事件選取範圍變更、 資料格編輯和重新排序資料行。

trans-unit.source: The DataGrid also exposes several events for row recycling that you can handle to customize rows.
trans-unit.target: DataGrid 也會公開數個事件回收，您可以處理自訂資料列的資料列。

trans-unit.source: To apply the same property settings to multiple DataGrid controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要將相同的屬性設定套用至多個資料格控制項，使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the DataGrid, see [DataGrid Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的組件和專屬於資料格的狀態，請參閱[DataGrid 樣式和範本](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in the DataGrid control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響如果該屬性會出現在 DataGrid 控制項的預設範本，並使用的設定。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Common Tasks The following table provides information about tasks that are typically associated with the DataGrid.
trans-unit.target: 一般工作表提供工作通常與資料格相關聯的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: |Task|Implementation| |----------|--------------------| |Set alternating row background colors|Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A> property to 2 or more, and then assign a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowBackground%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AlternatingRowBackground%2A> properties.| |Define cell and row selection behavior|Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> properties.| |Customize the visual appearance of headers, cells and rows|Apply a new <xref:System.Windows.Style> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ColumnHeaderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowHeaderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CellStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowStyle%2A> properties.| |Set sizing options|Set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: |工作 |實作 | |----------|--------------------| |設定替代資料列的背景色彩的方式 |將<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A>屬性設定為 2 或以上，並再將<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>指派給<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowBackground%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AlternatingRowBackground%2A>屬性。 | |定義資料格和資料列選取行為 |設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>屬性。 | |自訂標頭、 資料格和資料列的視覺外觀 |適用於新<xref:System.Windows.Style><xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ColumnHeaderStyle%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowHeaderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CellStyle%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowStyle%2A>屬性。 | |設定調整大小選項 |Set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth%2A> properties.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinWidth%2A></xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxWidth%2A></xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A></xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MinHeight%2A></xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MaxHeight%2A></xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CellStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowHeaderStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ColumnHeaderStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Style></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AlternatingRowBackground%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowBackground%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Sizing Options in the DataGrid Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).| |Access selected items|Check the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A> property to get the selected cells and check the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> property to get the selected rows.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[DataGrid 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。 | |存取選取的項目 |請檢查<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A>屬性以取得選取的資料格檢查<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A>屬性來取得選取的資料列。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A> property.| |Customize end-user interactions|Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserAddRows%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserDeleteRows%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserReorderColumns%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserResizeColumns%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserResizeRows%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserSortColumns%2A> properties.| |Cancel or change auto-generated columns|Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn> event.| |Freeze a column|Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.FrozenColumnCount%2A> property to 1 and move the column to the left-most position by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> property to 0.| |Use XML data as the data source|Bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> on the DataGrid to the XPath query representing the collection of items.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A>屬性。 | |自訂使用者互動 |設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserAddRows%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserDeleteRows%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserReorderColumns%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserResizeColumns%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserResizeRows%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserSortColumns%2A>屬性。 | |取消或變更自動產生的資料行 |處理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn>事件。 | |凍結資料行 |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.FrozenColumnCount%2A>屬性設為 1，並將<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A>屬性設定為 0，將資料行移到最左邊的位置。 | |使用 XML 資料做為資料來源 |繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>上代表的項目集合的 XPath 查詢 DataGrid。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.FrozenColumnCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserSortColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserResizeRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserResizeColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserReorderColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserDeleteRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserAddRows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectedCells%2A>

trans-unit.source: Create each column in the DataGrid.
trans-unit.target: DataGrid 中建立每個資料行。

trans-unit.source: Bind each column by setting the XPath on the binding to the query that gets the property on the item source.
trans-unit.target: 每個資料行繫結的項目來源取得屬性的查詢將繫結上設定 XPath。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn>.| |Group items|Bind to a <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource> that supports grouping.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn>。 | |群組項目 |繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>或<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>所支援的群組。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource> </xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Group, Sort, and Filter Data in the DataGrid Control](../Topic/How%20to:%20Group,%20Sort,%20and%20Filter%20Data%20in%20the%20DataGrid%20Control.md).| |Display the details section for a row|Define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate%2A> to specify the appearance of the details section.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何︰ 分組、 排序和 DataGrid 控制項中的篩選資料](../Topic/How%20to:%20Group,%20Sort,%20and%20Filter%20Data%20in%20the%20DataGrid%20Control.md)。 | |顯示詳細資料區段中的資料列 |定義<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate%2A>指定詳細資料 區段的外觀。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsVisibilityMode%2A> to specify when the details section is shown.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsVisibilityMode%2A>指定詳細資料 區段會顯示當。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsVisibilityMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add Row Details to a DataGrid Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).|
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何︰ 新增至 DataGrid 控制項的資料列詳細資料](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。 |

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a new item is added to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 發生於加入新項目之前<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background brush for use on alternating rows.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定替代資料列上使用的背景筆刷。

trans-unit.source: The AlternatingRowBackground, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowBackground%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A> properties together determine the appearance of each row's background.
trans-unit.target: AlternatingRowBackground <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowBackground%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A>屬性一起決定每個資料列背景的外觀。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowBackground%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A> is less than 2, setting the AlternatingRowBackground property sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A> to 2.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A>小於 2，設定 AlternatingRowBackground 屬性集<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A>為 2。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> that paints the background of every nth row where n is defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount*> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref>繪製每第 n 個資料列，其中 n 所定義的背景<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount*>

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AlternatingRowBackground*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AlternatingRowBackground*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AlternatingRowBackground*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the row details can scroll horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否可以水平捲動的資料列詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` to make sure that the contents of the row details sections are not scrolled out of view horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 將此屬性設定為`true`確定的資料列詳細資料區段的內容都不超出檢視水平捲動。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if row details cannot scroll; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果無法捲動的資料列詳細資料。，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AreRowDetailsFrozen*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AreRowDetailsFrozen*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AreRowDetailsFrozen*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the columns are created automatically.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否會自動建立資料行。

trans-unit.source: Setting AutoGenerateColumns to `true` or `false` creates or removes auto-generated columns.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定 AutoGenerateColumns`true`或`false`會建立或移除自動產生的資料行。

trans-unit.source: When the AutoGenerateColumns property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn> event will be raised for each column that is created.
trans-unit.target: 當 AutoGenerateColumns 屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn>會引發事件，每個資料行所建立。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn>

trans-unit.source: You can change or cancel the column being created in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 您可以變更或取消資料行中建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn>事件處理常式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn>

trans-unit.source: When auto-generation of all columns is complete, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratedColumns> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 自動產生的所有資料行完成時，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratedColumns>就會引發事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratedColumns>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> cannot auto-generate columns when the source is XML data.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>無法自動產生的資料行的 XML 資料來源時。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: In this case, create a custom <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，建立自訂<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if columns are created automatically; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果自動; 建立資料行否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when auto generation of all columns is completed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於完成自動產生的所有資料行。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn> event is raised for each column created.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn>建立每一個資料行就會引發事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratingColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: When all columns are created, this event will occur.
trans-unit.target: 所有資料行建立時，會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The AutoGeneratedColumns event is raised every time the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> attempts to generate columns.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > AutoGeneratedColumns 引發每次<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>嘗試產生資料行。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: For example, AutoGeneratedColumns is raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> is initialized, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> is set to `true`, or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> is changed, even if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，就會引發 AutoGeneratedColumns 時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>初始化時，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>設`true`，或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>變更時，即使<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>是`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an individual column is auto-generated.
trans-unit.target: 發生於個別資料行時自動產生。

trans-unit.source: You can change or cancel the column being created in the AutoGeneratingColumn event handler.
trans-unit.target: 您可以變更或取消 AutoGeneratingColumn 事件處理常式中建立的資料行。

trans-unit.source: When all columns are auto-generated, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratedColumns> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 所有資料行時，自動產生<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratedColumns>就會發生事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGeneratedColumns>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the BeginEdit command, which will place the current cell or row into edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 叫用 BeginEdit 命令，其中會將資料列的目前儲存格進入編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: If the command is enabled, this will cause the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginningEdit> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.PreparingCellForEdit>overrides and events to occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用命令，這會導致<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginningEdit>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.PreparingCellForEdit>覆寫和發生的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.PreparingCellForEdit> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginningEdit>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell or row enters edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果資料列的目前儲存格進入，編輯模式。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginEdit*> command, which will place the current cell or row into edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 叫用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginEdit*>命令，會將資料列的目前儲存格進入編輯模式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginEdit*>

trans-unit.source: If the command is enabled, this will cause the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginningEdit> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.PreparingCellForEdit>overrides and events to occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用命令，這會導致<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginningEdit>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.PreparingCellForEdit>覆寫和發生的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.PreparingCellForEdit> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginningEdit>

trans-unit.source: If called from an event handler, the event arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果已從事件處理常式，事件引數的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: May be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: May be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell or row enters edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果資料列的目前儲存格進入，編輯模式。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the command that indicates the intention to begin editing the current cell or row of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表開始編輯資料列的目前儲存格表示命令<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a row or cell enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 發生之前的資料列或儲存格進入編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: This event lets you perform special processing before a cell or row enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可讓您執行的儲存格之前的特殊處理或資料列會進入編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, this event provides information about the keyboard or mouse gesture that was used to enter editing mode, and gives you the option of canceling edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 此外，這個事件會提供已進入編輯模式，並可讓您選擇取消編輯模式中使用鍵盤或滑鼠軌跡的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: If this event is not canceled, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.PreparingCellForEdit> event is raised when this event completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果未取消此事件，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.PreparingCellForEdit>此事件完成時，就會引發事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.PreparingCellForEdit>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CancelEditCommand"></xref> command for the cell or row currently in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 叫用<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CancelEditCommand"></xref>命令儲存格或資料列目前處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: If a cell is currently in edit mode, the CancelEdit method cancels the cell edit, but not any pending row edits.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料格目前處於編輯模式下，CancelEdit 方法會取消儲存格的編輯，但不是任何暫止的編輯資料列。

trans-unit.source: If a cell is not in edit mode, CancelEdit cancels all pending row edits.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料格不是處於編輯模式，CancelEdit 會取消所有暫止資料列的編輯作業。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell or row exits edit mode, or if no cells or rows are in edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在目前的資料列結束編輯模式，或是如果沒有儲存格或資料列中編輯模式。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CancelEditCommand"></xref> command for the specified cell or row in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 叫用<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CancelEditCommand"></xref>命令為指定的儲存格處於編輯模式下的資料列。

trans-unit.source: This method reverts any pending editing changes for the specified <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridEditingUnit> and exits edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會回復任何暫止的編輯所指定的變更<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridEditingUnit>並結束編輯模式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridEditingUnit>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether to cancel row or cell edits.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，指定是否要取消資料列或資料格的編輯。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell or row exits edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果資料列的目前儲存格離開編輯模式。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the command that indicates the intention to cancel any pending changes to the current cell or row and revert to the state before the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginEditCommand"></xref> command was executed.
trans-unit.target: 代表命令，表示要取消任何暫止的變更資料列的目前儲存格，並還原成之前的狀態<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginEditCommand"></xref>執行命令。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user can add new rows to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否可以加入新資料列， <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true` a blank row is displayed at the bottom of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true` <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>底部顯示空白的資料列

trans-unit.source: A user can enter a new item into the blank row.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以輸入新的項目到空白資料列。

trans-unit.source: Adding a new row adds an item to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 加入新的資料列加入至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>項目

trans-unit.source: You can set default values for the new item by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.InitializingNewItem> event and setting the values programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定新項目的預設值處理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.InitializingNewItem>事件，並以程式設計方式設定的值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.InitializingNewItem>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can add new rows; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用者可以加入新的資料列。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserAddRows*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserAddRows*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserAddRows*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user can delete rows from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否可以刪除資料列從<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: By default, the user can delete rows by selecting one or more rows and pressing the DELETE key.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，使用者可以刪除資料列選取一個或多個資料列，然後按下 DELETE 鍵。

trans-unit.source: Deleting a row removes the item that the row represents from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 刪除資料列移除<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>資料列代表的項目

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> does not allow deletions, the user cannot delete rows even if this property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>不允許刪除，使用者無法刪除資料列，即使此屬性設定為`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can delete rows; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用者可以刪除資料列。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserDeleteRows*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserDeleteRows*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserDeleteRows*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user can change the column display order by dragging column headers with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否可以拖曳資料行標頭，使用滑鼠來變更資料行顯示順序。

trans-unit.source: You can set this reorder behavior for individual columns by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.CanUserReorder%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定個別資料行的重新排序行為設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.CanUserReorder%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.CanUserReorder%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.CanUserReorder%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property and the CanUserReorderColumns property are both set, a value of `false` will take precedence over a value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.CanUserReorder%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性和 CanUserReorderColumns 屬性都設定，值為`false`將優先於值為`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.CanUserReorder%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Columns can be frozen by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.FrozenColumnCount%2A> property greater than 0.
trans-unit.target: 可以凍結資料行，藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.FrozenColumnCount%2A>屬性大於 0。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.FrozenColumnCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: Frozen columns are always the leftmost columns in display order.
trans-unit.target: 凍結的資料行一律會顯示順序中的最左邊資料行。

trans-unit.source: You cannot drag frozen columns into the group of unfrozen columns or drag unfrozen columns into the group of frozen columns.
trans-unit.target: 您無法將凍結的資料行拖曳到未凍結的資料行群組，或將未凍結的資料行拖曳到已凍結的資料行群組。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can reorder columns; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用者可以重新排列資料行。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserReorderColumns*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CanUserReorderColumns*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user can adjust the width of columns by using the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否可以使用滑鼠來調整資料行的寬度。

trans-unit.source: This property does not affect whether column widths can be changed programmatically, such as by changing the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會影響資料行寬度可以變更以程式設計的方式，例如透過變更<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can set this resize behavior for individual columns by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.CanUserResize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定來設定個別資料行的調整大小行為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.CanUserResize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.CanUserResize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.CanUserResize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property and the CanUserResizeColumns property are both set, a value of `false` takes precedence over a value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.CanUserResize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性和 CanUserResizeColumns 屬性都設定，值為`false`值的優先順序高於`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.CanUserResize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can adjust the column width; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用者可以調整資料行寬度。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user can sort columns by clicking the column header.

trans-unit.target: 若要自訂拖曳的資料行標頭和置放位置指示器的外觀，設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumnReorderingEventArgs.DragIndicator%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumnReorderingEventArgs.DropLocationIndicator%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumnReorderingEventArgs.DropLocationIndicator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumnReorderingEventArgs.DragIndicator%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.DragIndicatorStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.DropLocationIndicatorStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.DragIndicatorStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.DropLocationIndicatorStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.DropLocationIndicatorStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.DragIndicatorStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains all the columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合，其中包含所有的資料行<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the Columns collection to add columns, remove columns, or update properties on the columns.
trans-unit.target: 用於將資料行加入、 移除資料行，或更新的資料行上的屬性資料行集合。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The order of columns in the collection does not determine the order that they will appear in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 集合中的資料行的順序不會判斷它們將出現在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>的順序

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> property determines the column order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A>屬性會決定資料行順序。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each column in the Columns collection defines a column in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: 資料行集合中的每個資料行定義的資料行在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the four column types that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> provides.
trans-unit.target: 下列表格列出四個資料行類型<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>提供。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: |Column Type|Data Display| |-----------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn>|Use to display URI data.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn>|Use to display enumeration data.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn>|Use to display text.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn>|Use to display Boolean data.| In addition, you can define your own custom column by using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn>.
trans-unit.target: |資料行類型 |資料顯示 | |-----------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn>|用來顯示資料的 URI。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn>|用來顯示列舉型別資料。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn>|用於顯示文字。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn>|用來顯示布林值資料。 | 此外，您可以在這裡定義您自己自訂的資料行使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn>

trans-unit.source: Columns in the collection must derive from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的資料行必須衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: Note that <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn>, which adds support for binding, derives from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> and is the base for several of the defined column types.
trans-unit.target: 請注意， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn>，這樣會將繫結，支援衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>是基底的數個定義的資料行類型。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn>

trans-unit.source: All columns in the collection use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的所有資料行使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>所定義的屬性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the Columns collection at run time regardless of whether it contains generated columns.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改在執行階段，不論它是否含有產生的資料行的資料行集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中的資料行集合<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the standard width and sizing mode of columns and headers in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定標準的寬度和資料行和標頭中的調整大小模式<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Width%2A> property set on an individual <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> takes precedence over the ColumnWidth property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Width%2A>屬性設定，針對個別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>欄寬 屬性的優先順序高於。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.DisplayValue%2A> of the ColumnWidth property is constrained by the following properties if they are set, in order of precedence: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.MaxWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.MaxColumnWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.MinWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.MinColumnWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.DisplayValue%2A>寬的屬性應有何限制的下列屬性會在設定時，依照優先順序:- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.MaxWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.MaxColumnWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.MinWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.MinColumnWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.MinColumnWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.MinWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.MaxColumnWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.MaxWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.DisplayValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The width and sizing mode of the columns and headers, in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 寬度和調整大小模式的資料行和標頭，在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.SizeToHeader*>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.SizeToHeader*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.SizeToHeader*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ColumnWidth*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ColumnWidth*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ColumnWidth*>

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEditCommand"></xref> command for the cell or row currently in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 叫用<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEditCommand"></xref>命令儲存格或資料列目前處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: If a cell is currently being edited, this method commits any pending changes to the cell without committing any pending changes to the row.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前正在編輯儲存格，此方法認可暫止的變更資料格而不需要任何暫止的變更認可至資料列。

trans-unit.source: This means that changes are propagated from the cell editing control to the pending row.
trans-unit.target: 這表示變更會傳播從編輯控制項暫止資料列的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: If a cell is not currently being edited, all pending row edits are committed.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料格不目前正在編輯，所有暫止的資料列編輯就無法認可。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell or row exits edit mode, or if no cells or rows are in edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在目前的資料列結束編輯模式，或是如果沒有儲存格或資料列中編輯模式。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEditCommand"></xref> command for the specified cell or row currently in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 叫用<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEditCommand"></xref>命令指定的儲存格或資料列目前處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: This method commits any pending changes for the specified <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridEditingUnit> and exits edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會認可任何暫止變更指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridEditingUnit>並結束編輯模式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridEditingUnit>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether to commit row or cell edits.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，指定是否要認可資料列或資料格的編輯。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to exit edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要結束編輯模式。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current cell or row exits edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果資料列的目前儲存格離開編輯模式。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the command that indicates the intention to commit pending changes to the current cell or row and exit edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 表示會指出来認可暫止變更的目前儲存格，或資料列並結束編輯模式的命令。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the default row content is prepared.
trans-unit.target: 預設資料列的內容已備妥之後，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: Event listeners can modify or add to the row clipboard content.
trans-unit.target: 事件接聽程式可以修改或加入資料列剪貼簿內容。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cell that has focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定具有焦點的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The value returned is a structure that provides information about the cell and the data item associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的值是一種結構，提供資料格，而與儲存格相關聯的資料項目的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: It is not an actual reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell>container.
trans-unit.target: 它不是實際參考<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell>容器。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell>

trans-unit.source: To set properties on the selected cells, you can set a trigger in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定選取的資料格屬性，您可以設定觸發程序<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CellStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CellStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CellStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Information about the cell that has focus.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格具有焦點的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell*>屬性已變更。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell*>

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property can change as a result of mouse or keyboard gestures, or because of a change to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentColumn%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>屬性可以變更滑鼠或鍵盤手勢的結果，或因為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentColumn%2A>屬性值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentColumn%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column that contains the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定包含目前儲存格的資料行。

trans-unit.source: A value of `null` indicates that an individual cell does not have focus.
trans-unit.target: 值為`null`表示個別資料格沒有焦點。

trans-unit.source: For example, a row has focus.
trans-unit.target: 例如，一個資料列具有焦點。

trans-unit.source: The column that contains the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含目前儲存格的資料行。

trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentColumn*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentColumn*>

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data item bound to the row that contains the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得繫結至包含目前儲存格的資料列的資料項目。

trans-unit.source: This property gets the data item for the row that either has focus, or contains the cell that has focus.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會取得焦點時，或是包含具有焦點的儲存格的資料列的資料項目。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 它相當於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName>所傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The data item bound to the row that contains the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 資料的項目繫結至包含目前儲存格的資料列。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Represents the command that indicates the intention to delete the current row.
trans-unit.target: 表示表示要刪除目前的資料列的命令。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Delete%2A?displayProperty=fullName> command that indicates the intention to delete the current row.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Delete%2A?displayProperty=fullName>表示要刪除目前的資料列的命令。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style that is used when rendering the drag indicator that is displayed while dragging a column header.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定呈現拖曳指標時拖曳資料行標頭會顯示時，會使用的樣式。

trans-unit.source: To define a <xref:System.Windows.Style> for the drag indicator, specify a <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 若要定義<xref:System.Windows.Style>拖曳指標，指定<xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set properties in the style to change the appearance of certain elements of the drag indicator, such as the border around the column header.
trans-unit.target: 您可以變更某些項目拖曳指標，例如資料行標頭框線外觀樣式中設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: However, the default template for the drag indicator uses a <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush> to paint a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> with an image of the original column header that is being dragged.
trans-unit.target: 不過，會使用預設範本，拖曳指標<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>來繪製<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>原始被拖曳的資料行標頭的映像。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> </xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>

trans-unit.source: As a result, if you set some properties in your style, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Foreground%2A>, they will appear to not be applied.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，如果您某些屬性中設定您的風格，例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Foreground%2A>，它們將會顯示未套用。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Foreground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change the appearance of the column header while it is being dragged, apply a new template that does not use the default <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更資料行標頭的外觀，被拖曳的期間，會套用新的範本不使用預設<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>

trans-unit.source: The style applied to a column header when dragging.
trans-unit.target: 拖曳時套用到資料行標頭的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.DragIndicatorStyle*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.DragIndicatorStyle*>

trans-unit.source: To define a <xref:System.Windows.Style> for the drop location indicator, specify a <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>.
trans-unit.target: 若要定義的<xref:System.Windows.Style>置放位置的指標，指定<xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> </xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: The style applied to a column header.
trans-unit.target: 套用到資料行標頭的樣式。
